headline: Orchestra BioMed Presents New AVIM Therapy Clinical Data at HRX Demonstrating Substantial and Sustained Blood Pressure Reductions that are Reproducible Upon Reactivation Following Washout

headline: Study of Medtronic Hugo™ robotic-assisted surgery system in hernia repair meets safety and effectiveness endpoints
summary: Medtronic plc (NYSE: MDT) today announced results from the Enable Hernia Repair clinical study evaluating the performance of the Hugo™ robotic-assisted surgery (RAS) system in inguinal and ventral hernia repair procedures. Enable Hernia Repair is the first-ever Investigational Device Exemption (IDE) clinical study completed for robotic-assisted hernia surgery in the United States.

headline: Saudi Arabia Smart Hospital Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Koninklijke Philips, Medtronic, SAP, Cerner, and Schneider Electric Healthcare
summary: The Saudi Arabia Smart Hospital Market is projected to grow from US$ 674.89 million in 2024 to US$ 1.77 billion by 2033, with an 11.33% CAGR from 2025 to 2033. Under Vision 2030, the Saudi government is driving healthcare digitalization, incorporating EHRs, IoT, AI, telemedicine, and 5G to enhance healthcare efficiency and accessibility.
